DOC.brief_summary: Patients with first time hematuria or patients previously diagnosed with papillomas/CIS of the bladder are included in the study. All surgeons are highly experienced in WL cystoscopy and familiar with NBI findings. Cystoscopy is performed with HD cameras and Olympus light sources. First, a systematic cystoscopy is made in WL. Secondly, the clinical decision is noted. After WL, the cystoscopy is made with NBI and any potential subsequent change in the clinical decision is noted. A total number of 896 patients is planned to be included.
